root.name: Dog Daze Deluxe
root.description: Dog Daze Deluxe, published like its predecessor through the Atari Program eXchange, is not a big change from the original, but it does add a graphical upgrade for sprites along with a colorful background, and more importantly allows for one-player play against the computer.Unfortunately this game was seldom seen or played, possibly due in part to the video game industry crash.A clone of the game was later developed, called Dog Daze Revolution, by the Twin Eagles Group.
